code: import{cartTypes}from"../../types";export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:cartTypes.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:cartTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearOutItemFromCart=function clearOutItemFromCart(item){return{type:cartTypes.CLEAR_OUT_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:cartTypes.REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};
